product_overview: BP Agency Dashboard is a comprehensive management system tailored for digital marketing agencies that offers role-based dashboards and features for various user roles such as employees, managers, admins, and super admins, enabling efficient agency operations and real-time performance tracking.
core_goals: Provide secure and unified authentication with role-based access control
Deliver personalized dashboards tailored to distinct user roles
Enable comprehensive employee performance tracking and KPI evaluation
Facilitate efficient client onboarding, management, and servicing
Support detailed employee management including onboarding and reviews
Offer SEO team-specific data entry, reporting, and appraisal capabilities
Provide robust reporting and analytics across departments and time periods
Engage users through gamification with reward point systems and controls
key_features: Unified authentication system with phone/password login and session management via Supabase
Role-specific dashboards for Super Admin, Admin, Management, Employees, Freelancers, and Interns
KPI tracking, performance leaderboards, and monthly performance reports
Client management features including onboarding forms, directories, and servicing dashboards
Employee management modules covering onboarding, directory, and performance reviews
SEO module featuring data entry forms, reporting dashboards, and appraisal system
Comprehensive reporting system providing growth analytics and department-specific reports
Arcade gamification system with point earning and redemption components and admin control panels
Responsive UI built with React, TailwindCSS and real-time data updates via Supabase
user_flow_summary: User logs in via secure authentication interface using phone and password
System authenticates user and determines role-based access permissions
User is directed to their personalized dashboard based on their role
Employees track and evaluate their KPIs and view leaderboard standings
Managers and admins monitor client portfolios and employee performance
SEO team members input SEO data and generate performance reports
Users participate in arcade gamification to earn and redeem points for rewards
Admins perform oversight, analytics, and manage user roles and permissions
validation_criteria: Successful login/logout with accurate session management
Correct role-based access and view restrictions enforced throughout the system
Dashboards display role-appropriate data and respond to real-time updates
Performance KPIs accurately tracked and leaderboard scores correctly calculated
Client and employee data can be created, read, updated, and deleted without errors
SEO data entry and reports reflect accurate analytics and appraisals
Reporting system generates correct monthly and growth reports
Arcade system correctly tracks points earned and redeemed, with admin controls effective
Frontend is responsive and functions seamlessly across supported devices
